A

AbstractServer - Class in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv
The AbstractServer provides a convenient and easy to use abstract class for Server implementations to extend from It provides the below capabilities for subclasses to reuse name - Ability to specify a name for the server providedCapabilities - Ability to specify a list of capabilities which are provided by the server requiredCapabilities - Ability to specify a list of capabilities which are required by the server in order to start successfully startLevel - Ability for kiln to set and retrieve the startlevel of the server
AbstractServer(String, String, String) - Constructor for class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.AbstractServer
 
AbstractServer(String, String[], String[]) - Constructor for class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.AbstractServer
 
AbstractServer(String) - Constructor for class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.AbstractServer
 
areRequirementsSatisfied(List<String>) - Method in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.Server
Verifies whether the given set of available requires satisfies the ones which is required by this server instance

This annotation is a binding annotation used to bind the program arguments within kiln.

Registers the given configuration source instance to the SubsysConfigSourceSet annotation.

registerSubsysInfo() - Method in class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Subsys
Registers or binds the SubsysInfo to the SubsysSet annotation @see #SubsysSet
RuntimeSysConfigSource - Annotation Type in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
The RuntimeSysConfigSource binding annotation is used to bind the JVM System properties passed at runtime The Kiln implementation loads all the System properties as a nested tree datastructure so that the configuration sources can be uniformly merged into a single nested configuration source.

S

Server - Interface in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv
The Server provides the ability for auto start and auto shutdown service capability in Kiln.
ServerSet - Annotation Type in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv
This annotation is used to bind a Server instance to the Server instance set.
SET(Class<T>, T...) - Static method in class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.util.CollectionUtils
Convenience function to create a Set instance of the given type and instances
setStartLevel(Integer) - Method in class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.AbstractServer
 
setStartLevel(Integer) - Method in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.Server
The start level designated by Kiln.
start(String[]) - Method in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.Server
The callback invoked by Kiln when it is appropriate for this server to start.
start() - Method in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Sys
Method invoked by the caller to start the 'system' Note that the implementation should ensure that the start() does not return till the system start is completed.
START_FAILED_EVENT - Static variable in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Sys
 
STARTED_EVENT - Static variable in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Sys
 
STARTING_EVENT - Static variable in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Sys
 
stop() - Method in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.srv.Server
The callback invoked by Kiln when it is appropriate for this server to stop.
stop() - Method in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Sys
Issues a stop signal when the Sys needs to be stopped Note that similar to the start() method, this method should not return till the system stop is completed.
STOPPED_EVENT - Static variable in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Sys
 
STOPPING_EVENT - Static variable in interface org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Sys
 
Subsys - Class in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
The Subsys represents an Abstraction of the Subsys in Kiln.
Subsys(SubsysInfo) - Constructor for class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Subsys
Creates a Subsys instance using the SubsysInfo
SubsysConfigSourceSet - Annotation Type in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
This binding annotation is used to bind and look up the Subsys configuration source set.
SubsysInfo - Class in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
The SubsysInfo is used to capture the Subsys instance information and attributes
SubsysInfo(String, Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.SubsysInfo
Construct a SubsysInfo with the given id and attributes
SubsysSet - Annotation Type in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
The SubsysSet is a qualifier annotation used to refer and inject the Set of all Subsys instances in the system.
Sys - Interface in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
Abstraction of a System in Kiln.
SysBuilder - Interface in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
The SysBuilder is an abstraction of a System builder in kiln.
SysConfigSource - Annotation Type in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
The SysConfiSource binding annotation is used to bind the complete composed configuration source in the system The Kiln implementation composes all the configuration sources and then binds one consolidated configuration source instance with this Binding annotation.
SysConfigSourceSet - Annotation Type in org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys
This is a binding annotation used to bind the System configurations supplied by the developer when using the kiln framework.
